entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerland 10:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: WNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 900 metres near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
